issue.title: [C++] Upgrade dependency versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4703](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4703). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At some point we should probably update the versions of the third-party libraries we depend on. There might be useful bug or security fixes there, or performance improvements.
